file.name: adminusers.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/lib admin users'
  description: admin users api specifications
  x-pages:
    - id: vironAdminUsers
      group: 管理画面/管理
      title: Viron 管理ユーザー
      description: |
        # 管理ユーザーの管理
        Vironを利用している管理ユーザーの **作成・更新・削除** を行います。
      contents:
        - title: 管理ユーザー
          type: table
          operationId: listVironAdminUsers
          resourceId: vironAdminUser

tags:
  - name: vironAdminUsers

paths:
  /viron/adminusers:
    get:
      operationId: listVironAdminUsers
      tags:
        - vironAdminUser
      summary: list admin users
      description: 管理ユーザー一覧
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironEmailQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironRoleIdQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironPagerSizeQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironPagerPageQueryParam'
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironSortQueryParam'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserListWithPager'
      security:
        - jwt: []
    post:
      operationId: createVironAdminUser
      tags:
        - vironAdminUser
      summary: create an admin user
      description: メアド/パスワード認証の管理ユーザーを追加する
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserCreatePayload'
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUser'
      security:
        - jwt: []

  /viron/adminusers/{id}:
    put:
      operationId: updateVironAdminUser
      tags:
        - vironAdminUser
      summary: update an admin user
      description: 管理ユーザーのロール等を更新する
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserUpdatePayload'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []
    delete:
      operationId: removeVironAdminUser
      tags:
        - vironAdminUser
      summary: remove an admin user
      description: 管理ユーザー削除
      parameters:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/parameters/VironIdPathParam'
      responses:
        204:
          description: OK
      security:
        - jwt: []

components:
  schemas:
    VironAdminUserListWithPager:
      allOf:
        - $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager'
        - type: object
          properties:
            list:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUserList'
          required:
            - list

    VironAdminUserList:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAdminUser'

    VironAdminUser:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          description: 管理ユーザーID
          type: string
        email:
          description: Eメールアドレス
          type: string
          format: email
        authType:
          description: 認証タイプ
          type: string
        roleIds:
          description: ロール一覧
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        createdAt:
          $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironCreatedAt'
        updatedAt:
          $ref: './components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironUpdatedAt'
      required:
        - id
        - email
        - authType

    VironAdminUserCreatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          description: Eメールアドレス
          type: string
          format: email
        password:
          description: パスワード
          type: string
          format: password
          pattern: "^(?=.*?[a-zA-Z])(?=.*?\\d)[a-zA-Z\\d!?#$%&@*+/-_<=>]{8,}"
        roleIds:
          description: ロールID
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      required:
        - email
        - password

    VironAdminUserUpdatePayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        password:
          description: パスワード
          type: string
          format: password
          pattern: "^(?=.*?[a-zA-Z])(?=.*?\\d)[a-zA-Z\\d!?#$%&@*+/-_<=>]{8,}"
        roleIds:
          description: ロールID
          type: array
          items:
            type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "VironAdminUserListWithPager": parse schema: allOf: [0]: at 1:1034: parse schema: resolve "./components.yaml#/components/schemas/VironPager": external "./components.yaml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
